hero.title: Hi, I'm Uriel!
hero.des0: Software Developer with over 3 years of experience working in the IT industry. Graduated B.S. in Computer Science with Honors.
hero.des1: Mainly focused on mobile and embedded software applications.
hero.des2: With extensive experience in mobile native applications, Web applications, and Embedded Software.
hero.des3: My technology stack includes C, C++, Java, Kotlin, and more.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of the top projects I have worked on.

laddy.subtitle: Industry leading provider of data broadcasting services
laddy.description: A proof of concept AndroidTV application using the latest ATSC 3.0 standard.

nuopen.subtitle: Online Tutorial Service
nuopen.description: NativeCamp offers English as Second Language (ESL) tutorial services online. It is the #1 installed app for Online ESL Lessons in the App and Play Store.

railwayz.subtitle: Global leader in imaging solutions
railwayz.description: Focused on embedded development of GUI panels for Lexmark printers running on QT, Android, and Flash.

jobamax.subtitle: All-in-one digitalized recruiting
jobamax.description: A new and upcoming Android/iOS mobile app for job hunters and recruiters offering a modern and unique experience.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I have a diverse set of technical skills. These are some of the tools I am most familiar with and work with every day.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I've worked with all types of companies. From start-ups, software consultancies, to R&D corporations.

contact.title: Wanna reach out?
contact.description: Feel free to drop me a message!

citation.content: Ninjas are not born, they are made
